name: Minotaur Mythology - 1 Week - Unreal Project [Prototype]
description:
Testing Unreal 4 2D abilities. I need more practice to make something amazing, but here is what I got done in about 1 week (3-4 days of work). Goal was to make a solo project (1 level) in 1 week and this is what I came with.

Genre: Game/Level prototype is a 2D action-platformer. Level is small, may take about 1 to 2 minutes to complete.

Art was created by me. Some features do not work properly. Very rough prototype.

Story: Minotaurius (Half Minotaur / Half Human) wants to take revenge! The hell masters cut his arm and put a curse on him to make him half human-half minotaur. Now he is back to the unknown lands for revenge!

Inspirations: God of War (Cratos) and Assassins Creed Oddysey.

How to play!

WASD to move

Space to jump

Left Click to swing axe (attack)

Travel through the ruins and reach the red portal to win!

CREDITS!
